entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
